page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO FORDEN
page.content: Forden is a very nice place to live. It has beautiful scenery all around. Forden is not noisy with traffic nor does it have horrible smelling fumes from factories polluting the air.It is a peacful farming district. There are lots of farms: Pen_y_lan,Lower Pen_y_ lan,The Gaer,Church Farm,The Hem, Severn- Bank,The Woodlands, Severnside,Nancribba,The Grove to name but a few. The farms mentioned are mostly dairy farms. Some farmers grow corn and keep sheep and beef cattle as well.There is Brynhyfrd hospital which used to be a work- house, but now it is a home for handicapped and old people and many local people work there. Forden has a concrete works which mainly makes agricultural water troughs and slabs. Forden also has a garden furniture- making business.
